title: Nuby New 3 Stage Ultra Durable Tritan Grow with Me No-Spill Bottle to Cup, 10 Oz, Blue
description: the new Tritan Feeding System – a versatile, grow-with-your-baby solution designed to transition from newborn to toddler stages. Made with ultra-durable, crystal-clear Tritan material from Eastman, this bottle is built to last.The non-drip nipple includes soft teething nubs that gently massage and stimulate your baby’s gums. When your child is ready, the included No-Spill spout easily replaces the nipple, making the transition to cup drinking smooth and mess-free.A built-in Vari-Flo valve lets your baby control the flow of liquid through both the nipple and spout, promoting independent feeding. Measurement markings in both ounces and milliliters are clearly printed on the base for accurate tracking of your baby’s intake.Easy-Grip removable handles are designed for little hands, helping your baby gain confidence with self-feeding. The textured surface ensures a secure and comfortable hold.Recommended Age: 3+ monthsCapacity: 10 oz
